An antidote against immoderate mourning for the dead. Being a funeral sermon preached at the burial of Mr. Thomas Bewley junior, December 17th. 1658. By Sa. Clarke, pastor in Bennet Fink, London. Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
[8], 55, [1] p.
printed by E. M. for George Calvert, at the Half Moon in Pauls Church-yard, neer the little North-door, London : 1659 [i.e. 1660?]
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffebr 2". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
